column5: I will be getting the opportunity to fish Lake of Bays this weekend. I hear that it's small mouth territory. Considering the recent high temperatures, i was thinking deep and slow. Any lake specific or species specific tips?  Thanks  Sean.

was on a lake last week that was right beside lake of bays in huntsville and theticket was chartruse tubes riged weedless . Lots of wood . hot depth turned out to be 8 to 13 feet. good luck man ...lots of smaller smallies to pick through in that area.
IMO   has the most and biggest smallies next to simcoe within 2 hours of toronto
